# RUN: llvm-mc --disassemble %s -triple=thumbv7-apple-darwin9 |& grep {invalid instruction encoding}
# XFAIL: *

# -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

# if d == n || d == t then UNPREDICTABLE
